subject: Boxing
Prisons and Prisoners
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather Jr., the undefeated boxer with an 18-room mansion, will live inside a 10-by-6-foot cell for up to 87 days starting June 1.
snippet: Floyd Mayweather Jr., the undefeated boxer with an 18-room mansion, will live inside a 10-by-6-foot cell for up to 87 days starting June 1.
